content.plainText: Posts from VC News Daily for 09/18/2025 The #1 Daily Digest For Venture Capital Transactions View this email in your browser VC News Daily Latest Venture Capital Financings Phia Inks $8M Seed Round By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:59 pm NEW YORK, NY, Phia, the AI-powered shopping agent founded by Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni, today announced its $8 million seed round. Read in browser » share on Twitter Centari Announces $14M Funding Round By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:49 pm NEW YORK, NY, Centari, the AI-powered deal insights platform trusted by AmLaw 25 and financial firms, today announced that it has raised $14 million in funding. Read in browser » share on Twitter Numeral Pulls In $35M Series B By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:44 pm SAN FRANCISCO, CA, Numeral, the AI-powered sales tax compliance platform, today announced a $35 million Series B round. Read in browser » share on Twitter Extend Nabs $20M Financing Round By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:36 pm NEW YORK, NY, Extend, a leading spend and expense management platform, today announced it has secured $20 million in additional capital, including new venture debt and an equity investment. Read in browser » share on Twitter Envive AI Raises $15M Series A By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 02:21 pm SEATTLE, WA, Envive AI, the intelligence layer for the future of digital commerce, announced the close of its $15 million Series A round led by Fuse VC. Read in browser » share on Twitter PassiveLogic Grabs $74M Series C Round By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 11:41 am SALT LAKE CITY, UT, PassiveLogic today announces it has raised $74 million in Series C funding round. Read in browser » share on Twitter MoldCo Receives $8M Seed Round By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 11:33 am BOSTON, MA, MoldCo, the first clinician-led digital health platform standardizing mold detox as routine preventative care, today announces $8 million in seed funding. Read in browser » share on Twitter GridStrong Secures $10M in Seed Funding By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 09:47 am NEW YORK, NY, GridStrong, the all-in-one platform for automating electric grid compliance and operations, announced it has raised an oversubscribed $10M seed funding round. Read in browser » share on Twitter Studio Science Lands Investment Funding By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 09:28 am INDIANAPOLIS, IN, Studio Science, a leading CX consultancy, has received a $2M growth investment. Read in browser » share on Twitter Splash Financial Banks $70M+ in Series C Round By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 09:23 am CLEVELAND, OH, Splash Financial, a leading AI-enabled lending marketplace, announced it has secured more than $70 million in a Series C funding round. Read in browser » share on Twitter RegScale Inks $30+ Million Oversubscribed Series B By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 17, 2025 07:59 pm TYSONS CORNER, VA, RegScale, the leader in Continuous Controls Monitoring (CCM), today announced it has raised $30+ million in an oversubscribed Series B round. Read in browser » share on Twitter TeachMe.To Raises $3 Million Seed+ Funding By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 17, 2025 07:51 pm SAN FRANCISCO, CA, TeachMe.To, the marketplace for finding and booking local in-person lessons, announced that it has raised $3 million in Seed+ funding. Read in browser » share on Twitter Recent Articles: Synthesize Bio Launches with $10M Seed Round Character Biosciences Inks $17M Series B Extension XL Batteries Bags $7.5 Million Omni Design Technologies Secures over $35M in Series A Funding Mongoose Software Emerges from Stealth with Funding Airia Scores $100M Financing Round Invisible Technologies Scoops Up $100M AllRock Bio Announces $50M Series A Round Iris Finance Raises $6.2M Seed Round CodeRabbit Secures $60M Series B Round Copyright © 2025 Massinvestor/ VC News Daily, All rights reserved. content.markdown:
The #1 Daily Digest For Venture Capital Transactions View this email in your browser ![](https://mcusercontent.com/a62ff0cea43485309b09fa7bf/images/ff4ec4c0-39ae-4ffd-8328-b8195cb96b58.png)

VC News Daily
=============

Latest Venture Capital Financings

Phia Inks $8M Seed Round
------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:59 pm* NEW YORK, NY, Phia, the AI-powered shopping agent founded by Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni, today announced its $8 million seed round. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

Centari Announces $14M Funding Round
------------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:49 pm* NEW YORK, NY, Centari, the AI-powered deal insights platform trusted by AmLaw 25 and financial firms, today announced that it has raised $14 million in funding. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

Numeral Pulls In $35M Series B
------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:44 pm* SAN FRANCISCO, CA, Numeral, the AI-powered sales tax compliance platform, today announced a $35 million Series B round. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

Extend Nabs $20M Financing Round
--------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 03:36 pm* NEW YORK, NY, Extend, a leading spend and expense management platform, today announced it has secured $20 million in additional capital, including new venture debt and an equity investment. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

Envive AI Raises $15M Series A
------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 02:21 pm* SEATTLE, WA, Envive AI, the intelligence layer for the future of digital commerce, announced the close of its $15 million Series A round led by Fuse VC. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

PassiveLogic Grabs $74M Series C Round
--------------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 11:41 am* SALT LAKE CITY, UT, PassiveLogic today announces it has raised $74 million in Series C funding round. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

MoldCo Receives $8M Seed Round
------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 11:33 am* BOSTON, MA, MoldCo, the first clinician-led digital health platform standardizing mold detox as routine preventative care, today announces $8 million in seed funding. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

GridStrong Secures $10M in Seed Funding
---------------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 09:47 am* NEW YORK, NY, GridStrong, the all-in-one platform for automating electric grid compliance and operations, announced it has raised an oversubscribed $10M seed funding round. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

Studio Science Lands Investment Funding
---------------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 09:28 am* INDIANAPOLIS, IN, Studio Science, a leading CX consultancy, has received a $2M growth investment. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

Splash Financial Banks $70M+ in Series C Round
----------------------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 18, 2025 09:23 am* CLEVELAND, OH, Splash Financial, a leading AI-enabled lending marketplace, announced it has secured more than $70 million in a Series C funding round. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

RegScale Inks $30+ Million Oversubscribed Series B

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 17, 2025 07:59 pm* TYSONS CORNER, VA, RegScale, the leader in Continuous Controls Monitoring (CCM), today announced it has raised $30+ million in an oversubscribed Series B round. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

TeachMe.To Raises $3 Million Seed+ Funding
------------------------------------------

*By VCNewsDaily Staff on Sep 17, 2025 07:51 pm* SAN FRANCISCO, CA, TeachMe.To, the marketplace for finding and booking local in-person lessons, announced that it has raised $3 million in Seed+ funding. Read in browser \>\> share on Twitter

### Recent Articles:
